policy.name: Policy for service #51937313, NonSoapServiceCertHttp
policy.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:SslAssertion> <L7p:RequireClientAuthentication booleanValue="true"/> </L7p:SslAssertion> <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:SpecificUser> <L7p:IdentityProviderOid longValue="-2"/> <L7p:UserLogin stringValue="NonSoapGuy"/> <L7p:UserName stringValue="NonSoapGuy"/> <L7p:UserUid stringValue="52199424"/> </L7p:SpecificUser> </wsp:OneOrMore> <L7p:EchoRoutingAssertion/> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>
